headline: This Magnificent Semiconductor Stock Has Shot Up 60% in 3 Months. It Can Still Soar Higher.
summary: Semiconductor equipment supplier Lam Research has shot up impressively in the past three months, and it is still trading at an attractive valuation.  The construction of semiconductor plants worldwide should be a tailwind for the company, leading to solid growth in its bottom line.  Lam's growth potential and valuation suggest that this chip stock is on track to deliver more gains.
